description: Try this delicious, spiced Christmas cake recipe for a classic Christmas dessert that's sure to bring holiday cheer.
name: Spiced Christmas Cake Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.5 cup Sunbeam blanched almonds, roughly chopped
1 Granny Smith apple, peeled, cored, coarsely grated

recipeInstructions.text: Place mixed fruit, cherries, nuts, apple, syrup and liqueur in a large bowl and stir to combine. Stand, covered, for 8 hours or overnight to allow flavours to infuse.
Preheat oven to 150oC/130oC fan-forced. Grease a 10-cup capacity bundt pan, making sure crevices are well coated.
Using an electric mixer, beat butter and brown sugar until light and fluffy. Add eggs, one at a time, beating well between each addition. Add flour and mixed spice, then beat until just combined.

Place orange juice and bicarbonate of soda in a small bowl and stir to combine. Add juice mixture to butter mixture, then beat until just combined. Add zest and mixed fruit mixture, and beat until just combined. Spoon mixture into pan, pressing mixture into crevices. Smooth top.
Bake for 2 hours 30 minutes or until a skewer inserted into centre comes out clean. Cool cake in pan for 1 hour before inverting into a wire rack to cool completely. Serve dusted with icing sugar.
